description: Server-side entry point for Remix framework handling HTTP requests, rendering React components to streams, and managing request headers and bot detection.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main exported function handling incoming HTTP requests, directing to bot or browser-specific handling.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles rendering for bot requests, streaming the server response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles rendering for browser requests, streaming the server response.
